subject: surprise blackberries
body:
one day earlier in the summer when we had people over in the backyard, someone noticed that there are blackberries growing on sharp vines twisted around the stand of trees in the back of the yard.

they're still growing, these surprise blackberries, and i just ate a few ripe ones
